sentences.en: After a busy day, the room in which you retire should provide a haven of tranquility so that you can rest and sleep adequately.
sentences.cn: 在忙碌的一天结束后，你回到的那个房间应该是一个宁静的庇护所，这样你就可以好好休息，保持充足的睡眠。

sentences.en: All was tranquility and repose. Suddenly into the picture staggered Walter Cronkite.
sentences.cn: 一切都安谧与恬静. 突然,沃尔特?克朗凯特蹒跚着闯入了画面.

sentences.en: And while I love my family to death, this time of tranquility is one of absolute bliss for me.
sentences.cn: 虽然我对我的家庭爱得要死，但这片刻的宁静绝对是我的幸福之一。

sentences.en: Despite his tranquility, a somewhat heavy brow speaks temper.
sentences.cn: 尽管他很恬静, 可是那只有点紧蹙的额头说明他肝火很旺.

sentences.en: For this brings not only the tranquility which comes from doing well, but also that which comes from doing few things.
sentences.cn: 因为这不仅带来由于做事适当而产生的宁静，而且带来由于做很少的事而产生的宁静。

sentences.en: He wanted, she supposes , to cheat her of her tranquility as he had cheated them.
sentences.cn: 她推测,他是想像耍弄她们那样耍弄她.

sentences.en: I wanted peace and quiet, tranquility, but was too much aboil inside.
sentences.cn: 我需要和睦和宁静, 需要安宁, 但是我的内心翻腾得太厉害了.

sentences.en: If you'll only not tell papa, my going need not disturb the tranquility.
sentences.cn: 你只要不告诉爸爸, 那我去,也碍不着任何人的平静.

sentences.en: Improved Tranquility? Removed and replaced by the new talent Improved Rebirth.
sentences.cn: 增加宁静 - 被删除,并被新的天赋强化重生所取代.

sentences.en: In tranquility seek your true nature. In selflessness find nobility and advancement.
sentences.cn: 宁静才能致远,从宁静中可以找回自己;无私才能容众,从无私中可以扩大自我.

sentences.en: It needed all Jane's steady mildness to bear these attacks with tolerable tranquility.
sentences.cn: 幸亏简临事从容不迫,柔和镇定,好容易才忍受了这些谗言诽语.

sentences.en: Love, happiness and tranquility are all contagious.
sentences.cn: 爱、幸福与宁静都是有感染力的。

sentences.en: Maldives'Vabbinfaru Island, the island is known for its tranquility and romance.
sentences.cn: 马尔代夫瓦宾法鲁岛----瓦宾法鲁岛以宁静和浪漫著称.

sentences.en: Stuant's wistful tranquility and almost saintlike aloofness were hard nuts to crack, even for Sister Agatha.
sentences.cn: 斯图阿特的恼人的平静和几乎象圣徒那样的孤独很难对付, 即使阿加莎修女也不例外.

sentences.en: The city was finally restored to tranquility.
sentences.cn: 这座城市最后恢复了平静.

sentences.en: The hotel is a haven of peace and tranquility.
sentences.cn: 这家旅馆是一处安宁的去处。

sentences.en: Tranquility: Things will go more smoothly than you thought. Just relax.
sentences.cn: 宁静: 事情会比你想象的更顺利, 请放松.

sentences.en: We all like the tranquility of the country life.
sentences.cn: 我们都喜欢乡村生活的宁静。

sentences.en: What could possibly disturb such tranquility?
sentences.cn: 什么有可能会破坏这样的宁静呢？

sentences.en: While it has lost its tranquility, the area has gained in liveliness.
sentences.cn: 虽然该地区失去了往日的宁静，但是却有了生气。

words.tran_cn: 安静的，平静的；安宁的；稳定的

trans.tran_cn: tranquillity的美式写法：平静，安静，安宁，平稳，和平与安宁的气氛、状态
